items.sentence: He sent me a letter to the effect that his poultry farm would go bankrupt sooner or later.
Recently, Tom has been talking a lot about the past and looking through old family albums.
The cat is sitting on the chair and looking at the meat that's lying on the kitchen table.
My father celebrated his seventieth birthday this year, but he's more energetic than I am.
After a big night out, Tom looked in the mirror and was shocked to see he had a black eye.
